name: Chandana
wishText: I will be always your biggest supporter and as always I will be there for you anytime. You know what, this world got luckier since 21 years/ 252 months/ 1095 weeks 6 days/ 7,671 days/ 184,104 hours/ 11,046,240 minutes/ 662,774,400 seconds
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Entry: Because, you told that you never had good birthdays
text5Content: You are so special to me
outroText: Okay, now tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
